title: Hanging, "Kenoten on the Hudson", 1950–59
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist (batik) applied by brush on plain weave; lined with damassé (plain weave plus 1/3 twill)
description: Landscape with trees, wild flowers, deer and birds with Hudson River in background. Wildflowers in the border: hepatica, trailing arbutus, wild ginger and blood root with fiddlehead ferns in lower corners. Lined with silk damassé patterned by offset rows of Chinese-style medallions. Signed in lower right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, "Kenoten on the Hudson", 1950–59.Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist (batik) applied by brush on plain weave; lined with damassé (plain weave plus 1/3 twill). 1977-112-3.
